title: Urgent Opening For SAP SD role For a manufacturing role
tagsAndSkills: SAP SD,Sap Sd Sales Order Management,Sap Sales And Distribution,Distribution,SAP,Sales,Sales Order,Saps
jobDescription:
Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced SAP S/4HANA SD (Sales and Distribution) Lead to join our IT team. The successful candidate will lead the design, implementation, and maintenance of our SAP S/4HANA SD module. This role requires strong project management skills, extensive knowledge of sales and distribution processes, and a deep understanding of SAP S/4HANA functionalities.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Project Leadership:
    • Lead SAP S/4HANA SD module implementation and enhancement projects.
    • Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other SAP modules.
    • Develop project plans, timelines, and budgets, ensuring adherence to schedules and cost constraints.
  • Technical Expertise:
    • Configure and customize the SAP S/4HANA SD module to meet business requirements.
    • Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the SD module.
    • Provide expert guidance on best practices and industry standards.
  • Business Analysis:
    • Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into SAP solutions.
    • Conduct workshops and training sessions for end-users and other IT staff.
    • Document functional specifications and create test cases for new implementations and updates.
  • Maintenance and Support:
    • Monitor the performance of the SD module and perform necessary maintenance.
    • Provide ongoing support and training to users.
    • Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulations.
  • Continuous Improvement:
    • Stay updated with the latest SAP S/4HANA SD features and industry trends.
    • Propose and implement improvements to current systems and processes.

Qualifications:

  • Education:
    • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field.
  • Experience:
    • Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in SAP SD module Implementation and support.
    • Proven experience with SAP S/4HANA.
    • Project management experience is highly desirable.
  • Technical Skills:
    • Deep understanding of SAP S/4HANA SD module functionalities.
    • Proficient in SAP SD configuration and customization.
    • Knowledge of integration points with other SAP modules (MM, PP, FICO, etc.).
    • Experience with SAP Fiori applications is a plus.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
    • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Ability to lead and mentor a team.
    • Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.

Preferred QualificatiDons:

  • SAP S/4HANA certification.
  • Experience in the manufacturing or retail industry.
  • Knowledge of SAP Activate methodology.Role & responsibilities


Preferred candidate profile



Perks and benefits

title: Senior Executive  SEO / Digital Marketing
tagsAndSkills: On-Page Optimization,Keyword Research,Content Strategy,Analytics & Reporting,Link Building,Digital marketing,Senior,Digital

ambitionBoxData.Title: Oro Precious Metals Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Sr. Executive - SEO and Digital Marketing


Job Overview:


The SEO Specialist will be responsible for developing, implementing, and optimizing SEO strategies to increase organic traffic, improve search engine rankings, and enhance user experience. The ideal candidate is a data-driven, analytical thinker who is passionate about all things SEO and digital marketing.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Keyword Research: Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify opportunities for organic growth.
  • On-Page Optimization: Optimize website content, meta tags, headers, URLs, and internal linking structure.
  • Technical SEO: Identify and resolve technical SEO issues such as crawl errors, indexation problems, and site speed optimization.
  • Content Strategy: Collaborate with content creators to develop SEO-friendly content that aligns with target keywords and audience needs.
  • Link Building: Develop and execute link-building strategies to increase domain authority and improve rankings.
  • Competitor Analysis: Analyze competitors SEO strategies and performance to identify areas of opportunity.
  • Analytics & Reporting: Monitor and report on SEO performance metrics using tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and other SEO software.
  • Stay Updated: Keep up to date with the latest SEO trends, algorithm changes, and best practices.


Qualifications:


  • Experience: 2+ years of experience in SEO, with a proven track record of improving organic search rankings.
  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (preferred but not required).
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Search Console, Google Analytics, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Moz, Screaming Frog, etc.
  • Analytical Skills: Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
  • Content Knowledge: Understanding of content marketing and how to optimize content for SEO.
  • Technical SEO: Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and basic web development principles.
  • Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Teamwork: Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.


Preferred Skills:


  • Experience with CMS: Knowledge of Content Management Systems (e.g., WordPress, Shopify).
  • Local SEO: Experience with local SEO strategies, including optimizing Google My Business profiles.
  • E-commerce SEO: Experience with SEO for e-commerce platforms.
  • Certifications: Google Analytics and Google Ads certifications are a plus.

Why Join Us:


  • Growth Opportunities: Be part of a growing company with opportunities for career advancement.
  • Innovative Environment: Work in a dynamic, innovative environment where your ideas matter.
